##Custom report using:
* College(s): `r input$school`
* Department(s): `r input$dept`
* Major(s): `r input$major`
* Campus(es): `r input$campus`


```{r echo=FALSE}
options(knitr.table.format = "latex")
options(kableExtra.latex.load_packages = TRUE)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
source("functions.R")
```
\newpage

```{r echo=FALSE}
cap <- "Outcomes Survey Response Rates by Program Level"

Table1(datasetInput()) %>%
      kable(digits = 2,
            caption = cap,
            booktabs = TRUE) %>%
      kable_styling(latex_options = "striped", full_width = TRUE) %>%
      row_spec(0, bold = TRUE)
```

```{r echo=FALSE}
cap <- "Overall Satisfaction with Webster"
foot <- "Strongly Agree (4); Mostly Agree (3); Mostly Disagree (2); Strongly Disagree (1)"

TableA(datasetInput(), c("Q101", "Q102")) %>%
      kable(digits = 2,
            caption = cap,
            booktabs = TRUE) %>%
      kable_styling(latex_options = "striped", full_width = TRUE) %>%
      row_spec(0, bold = TRUE) %>%
      column_spec(1, "30em") %>% 
      footnote(foot,
               general_title = "Scale:",
               footnote_as_chunk = TRUE)
```

```{r echo=FALSE}
cap <- "Career Outcomes - Employment"
foot1 <- "Strongly Agree (4); Mostly Agree (3); Mostly Disagree (2); Strongly Disagree (1)"
foot2 <- "Averages based on responses where employed full- or part-time was primary activity."

TableA(datasetInput(), paste0("Q", 108:109)) %>%
      kable(digits = 2,
            caption = cap,
            booktabs = TRUE) %>%
      kable_styling(latex_options = "striped", full_width = TRUE) %>%
      row_spec(0, bold = TRUE) %>%
      column_spec(1, "20em") %>% 
      footnote(foot1,
               general_title = "Scale:",
               footnote_as_chunk = TRUE) %>%
        footnote(foot2,
               general_title = "Note:",
               footnote_as_chunk = TRUE)
```
